ing: 10 1/2 ounces low-fat, firm silken tofu, crumbled
4 teaspoons lemon juice, or more to taste
des: "This is a non-dairy sour cream alternative and stays fresh for about 5 days. Substitute any vegan sweetener for sugar and olive oil for canola. Serve over Mexican dishes and baked potatoes."
ins: Blend tofu, lemon juice, canola oil, apple cider vinegar, sugar, and salt in a blender until smooth and creamy; refrigerate.
